actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that the automatic cost-of-living increases in benefits thereunder shall be based either on increases in the Consumer Price Index or on increases in wages, whichever (in any particular case) is lower.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to base the automatic cost of living increases in title II benefits either on increases in the Consumer Price Index or on increases in wages, whichever is lower for the cost of living computation quarter involved.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that the automatic cost-of-living increases in benefits thereunder shall be based either on increases in the Consumer Price Index or on increases in wages, whichever (in any particular case) is lower.
